data.title: Investing in Microsoft Stock (MSFT)
data.text: Investopedia's ultimate guide to investing in Microsoft (MSFT). Business segments, financials, top shareholders, split history, companies it owns, and everything in between.

data.title: Big Tech should be ‘very nervous' about a Democrat sweep: Tusk
data.text: Tusk Holdings CEO and venture capitalist Bradley Tusk argues a Democrat sweep in the election would likely lead to antitrust, privacy and Section 230 issues for Big Tech. Subscribe to Fox Business!

data.title: Remote Working Wave to Drive Microsoft's (MSFT) Q1 Earnings
data.text: Microsoft's (MSFT) fiscal first-quarter results are likely to reflect momentum in Azure, impressive Teams user growth led by coronavirus-led work-from-home push and solid uptake of gaming solutions.

data.title: Microsoft to Buy Alternative Fuels for Alaska Air as Part of Climate Pledge
data.text: The tech giant is trying to cut emissions on some of its employees' most-traveled routes.

data.title: Microsoft to buy green jet fuel to cut emissions from business flights
data.text: Microsoft will buy sustainable jet fuel to help reduce the environmental impact of its employees' business travel, the tech giant said Thursday. The Windows maker announced a partnership with Alaska Airlines to offset emissions from its staffers' flights on three frequently traveled routes out of the company's headquarters in Redmond, Washington.

data.title: Microsoft to buy jet fuel made with waste oil for Alaska Airlines in climate pledge
data.text: Microsoft is planning to buy alternative jet fuel for Alaska Airlines in an effort to offset business-travel emissions.
